Class Budget

java.lang.Object
Budget
public class Budget extends Object
Represents a budget with its associated details including time period, amount, and remaining balance. Tracks budget allocations for specific categories over defined date ranges.
Author:
Kholod Ahmed

    Budget(int budgetId, int userId, String category, Date startDate, Date endDate, double amount, double remaining)
    Constructs a Budget with all fields specified (including remaining amount).
    Budget(int userId, String category, Date startDate, Date endDate, double amount)
    Constructs a new Budget with auto-incremented ID and initializes remaining amount to full amount.

      static int counter

  • Constructor Details

    • Budget

      public Budget(int userId, String category, Date startDate, Date endDate, double amount)
      Constructs a new Budget with auto-incremented ID and initializes remaining amount to full amount.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user this budget belongs to
      category - the budget category/type
      startDate - the start date of the budget period
      endDate - the end date of the budget period
      amount - the total allocated budget amount

    • Budget

      public Budget(int budgetId, int userId, String category, Date startDate, Date endDate, double amount, double remaining)
      Constructs a Budget with all fields specified (including remaining amount).
      Parameters:
      budgetId - the specific ID to assign to this budget
      userId - the ID of the user this budget belongs to
      category - the budget category/type
      startDate - the start date of the budget period
      endDate - the end date of the budget period
      amount - the total allocated budget amount
      remaining - the remaining/unspent budget amount

    • setAmount

      public void setAmount(double amount)
      Updates the total budget amount (resets remaining amount to new value).
      Parameters:
      amount - the new budget amount

    • updateBudget

      public void updateBudget(String category, double amount)
      Updates both category and amount (resets remaining to new amount).
      Parameters:
      category - the new budget category
      amount - the new budget amount

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the budget in CSV format.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      comma-separated string containing all budget fields
